item.description:
Hey again!

I'm slowly making my way north and am pleased to announce the next Maine Animal Welfare Meet-Up will take place in Bangor, at the Bangor Humane Society! This will be an introductory meet-up to get activists in the Bangor area together to think about animal issues and find out what is going on in Maine when it comes to animal welfare. I hope many of you can attend and please pass the message on to your friends and other animal lovers.

The timing coincides with the start of Maine's legislative session, so we'll have plenty of legislative stuff to talk about as well. Let's get active for animals!

Regards,
Katie

group.name: The Maine Animal Welfare Meetup Group

item.name: Bangor Animal Welfare Meet-Up
